title: Eyelash Growth Supplement | Natural Lash & Eyebrow Growth Vitamins with Biotin, Keratin & Collagen | Longer, Fuller, Thicker Lashes & Brows - 60 Capsules
descriptionHtml:
Eyelash Growth - Natural Lash & Brow Enhancement

Achieve longer, fuller lashes and thicker eyebrows naturally with our Eyelash Growth Supplement. This comprehensive beauty formula combines biotin, keratin, collagen, and essential nutrients to nourish hair follicles from within, promoting healthy lash and brow growth without harsh chemicals or serums.

Key Benefits

  • Promotes Lash Growth: Biotin and B-vitamins support keratin production for longer, stronger lashes
  • Thicker Eyebrows: Nourishes brow follicles for fuller, more defined eyebrows
  • Strengthens & Conditions: Prevents breakage and brittleness for healthier lashes
  • Natural Enhancement: Works from within without irritating serums or extensions
  • Hair, Skin & Nails: Bonus benefits for overall beauty and wellness
  • Safe & Effective: Natural ingredients without harsh chemicals

Beauty-Enhancing Ingredients

  • Biotin (High Potency): Essential B-vitamin that supports keratin infrastructure for lash and brow growth
  • Keratin: Structural protein that strengthens lashes and prevents breakage
  • Collagen: Supports hair follicle health and elasticity
  • Horsetail Extract: Rich in silica for stronger, healthier lashes
  • Bamboo Extract: Natural source of silica that promotes hair strength
  • MSM: Sulfur compound that supports keratin and collagen production
  • Vitamin E: Antioxidant that nourishes follicles and promotes circulation
  • B-Vitamin Complex: Supports cellular energy and hair growth

How It Works

Unlike topical serums that can cause irritation, our supplement works from within to nourish lash and brow follicles with essential nutrients. The combination of biotin, keratin, and collagen supports the natural growth cycle, resulting in longer, fuller, and healthier lashes and brows over time.

Perfect For

  • Sparse or thin eyelashes
  • Over-plucked or thin eyebrows
  • Lash damage from extensions or mascara
  • Age-related lash thinning
  • Anyone seeking natural lash enhancement

Suggested Use: Take 2 capsules daily with food. Results typically visible in 4-8 weeks with consistent use.

Quality Assurance: Made with premium beauty nutrients. No harsh chemicals or irritants.
shortDescriptionHtml: Achieve longer, fuller lashes and thicker eyebrows naturally. Our eyelash growth supplement with Biotin, Keratin, Collagen, and Horsetail Extract nourishes follicles from within for beautiful lashes and brows. 60 capsules.
suggestedUse: Take 2 capsules daily with food. Results typically visible in 4-8 weeks with consistent use.
supplementFacts:
Supplement Facts
Serving Size: 2 Capsules
Servings Per Container: 30

Amount Per Serving / %DV
Vitamin A (as Beta-carotene) 120 mcg RAE 13%
Vitamin C (as Ascorbic acid) 120 mg 133%
Calcium (as Calcium carbonate) 80 mg 6%
Iron (as Ferrous fumarate) 14.5 mg 81%
Vitamin D3 (as Cholecalciferol) 20 mcg 100%
Vitamin E (as DL-Alpha tocopheryl acetate) 14 mg 93%
Vitamin B1 (as Thiamine mononitrate) 6 mg 500%
Vitamin B6 (as Pyridoxine HCl) 8 mg 471%
Folate 1,467 mcg DFE 367% (880 mcg Folic Acid)
Vitamin B12 (as Cyanocobalamin) 12 mcg 500%
Biotin 600 mcg 2,000%
Vitamin B5 (as D-Calcium pantothenate) 30 mg 600%
Magnesium (as Magnesium Oxide) 120 mg 29%
Zinc (as Zinc Oxide) 7 mg 64%
Manganese (as Manganese amino acid chelate) 4 mg 174%
Potassium (as Potassium gluconate) 12 mg <1%
Proprietary Blend: 409 mg **
PABA, L-Tyrosine HCL, Horsetail extract (Equisetum arvense L.) (Whole herb), Fo-Ti (Polygonum multiflorum) (root), Bamboo extract (Phyllostachys viridis) (leaf), Nettle root (Urtica dioica L.), Peony (Paeonia lactiflora) (root), Spirulina (Arthrospira platensis) (whole plant), Saw palmetto (Serenoa repens) (fruit), Plant sterols (Glycine max) (leaf), Alfalfa (Medicago sativa) (herb), Barley grass (Hordeum vulgare L.) (aerial)

** Daily Value (DV) Not Established

Inactive Ingredients: Cellulose (Vegetable Capsule), Rice Flour, Magnesium stearate, Silicon dioxide. Contains: Soy.
